item.title: Career stats
item.description: This page shows statistics of players’ battles fought during their Blitz “career” until the end of update 6.9. Battles per player Number of total battles per player in the end of the update 6.9. An average player has played 4887 battles by the end of update 6.9. Median battle count was 2430 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) was 163018 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update (i.

item.title: Tier X statistics
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier X during update 6.9. Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.9. On average, players played 115 battles. Median was 45 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.9 was 5019 battles. The following tables shows battle counts by N% most inactive players during the update.

item.title: Tier X Tanks
item.description: Highest Average WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR at tier X during update 6.9. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update. Only tanks with more than 50 players are listed. This may filter out few upcoming tanks that are being tested. Highest Average WR - Table Average WR denotes average WR in a tank accross all the players during the update.

item.title: Update 6.9
item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought during 6.9. All the stats (WR, damage, battles, etc.) refer to stats during the update, not cumululative/total/lifetime stats unless otherwise mentioned. Battles per Player The graph shows the number of battles fought per player during the update 6.9. On average, players played 383 battles. Median was 236 and the largest number of battles recorded by a single player (in the dataset) during the update 6.

item.title: Tank statistics
item.description: Highest Average WR This graph shows the tanks with the highest average WR during update 6.9. Player WR denotes the tank’s players’ average WR across all the tanks during the update. Only tanks with more than 30 players are listed. This may filter out few upcoming tanks that are being tested. Highest Average WR - Table Average WR denotes average WR in a tank accross all the players during the update.

item.description: This page list statistics of battles fought at tier IX during update 6.9. Battles per player Number of battles fought per player during the update 6.9. item.title: Statistics by tier
item.description: Update 6.9 This page shows various statistics per tier played. Average tier WR vs average tier This graph shows player WR vs. average tier during the update 6.9. Minimum 50 battles required. Share of players per WR per tier This chart shows share of players with certain WR (bar color-code) at certain tier (x-axis). Each players’ battles at different tiers have been taken into account as long as the player as at least 100 battles at a tier during the update.

item.title: Statistics by Region
item.description: Update 6.9 This page shows statistics per Blitz servers/regions (EU, NA, ASIA, Russia) during update 6.9. Statistics for the Chinese server are not available via WG API. Number of players This graphs shows players by region in the dataset who have played at least one game. Please note, this does not mean all the players per server, but just those who have been recorded in the BlitzAnalysiz database. WR Distribution This graph shows how the players overall WR during update 6.
